attributes.action: maintain the first past the post system in the Commons, and ceate a House of Lords elected by proportional representation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The first past the post system in the Commons allows for the creation of a strong government with clear objectives. Creating a second chamber, elected simply by the percentage share of votes in a national election, and which will be able to scrutinize and amend legislation, will allow minority parties a role in parliament.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
